#summary A gallery of third-party applications that use the Plazes API.

== Plazers ==

A _Plazer_ is a tool that updates your Plazes geopresence information.

 * [maemoplazer] -- for devices like the Nokia N800.
 * [PythonS60Plazer] -- for devices like the Nokia N95.
 * [iPlazer] -- for the iPhone and iPod Touch.
 * [http://tinyplazer.com TinyPlazer] -- a web app for mobile devices
 * [http://code.google.com/p/plazes/source/browse/trunk/plazer_ruby_activeresource/plazer.rb plazer_ruby_activeresource] -- A simple commandline plazer

==== Need Updating ====

 * [http://code.google.com/p/twaiku/ Twaiku] -- for Quicksilver (uses the deprecated Plazes API)
 * [http://automatique.svnrepository.com/tijs/trac.cgi/browser/quicksilver/jaiku-plazes Jaiku-Plazes Quicksilver Script] -- for Quicksilver (uses the deprecated Plazes API)

== Republishing ==

These applications take Plazes geopresence information and republish or reuse it elsewhere.

 * PresenceRouter
